messages.title: Broadland backs Dan Roper
messages.content: More and more Broadland & Fakenham residents are backing local Lib Dem Dan Roper to be our next MP. They have been impressed by Dan's record of action and the fact that as a local Broadland resident, he knows the issues that matter to local people.

messages.title: A two horse race
messages.content: The race in Broadland is between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives. Labour are in a poor third place here and cannot win.

messages.title: You can trust the Liberal Democrats and Vince Cable to make the right decisions
messages.content: Long before the economic crisis started, Vince Cable was warning people that Gordon Brown's phoney 'boom' was built on cheap credit and not on real economic strength. Now, with the economy in a mess, we need more than ever a Liberal Democrat government.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Dan Roper has worked with local campaigners opposing the building of 4000 houses in Rackheath, his campaigns against the Tories plans to not complete the NDR and has campaigned to protect essential public transport and rural services for our many villages and towns.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race here

issues.economy: Vince Cable was warning people that Gordon Brown's phoney 'boom' was built on cheap credit and not on real economic strength.

housing.content: Dan Roper has worked with local campaigners opposing the building of 4000 houses in Rackheath, his campaigns against the Tories plans to not complete the NDR and has campaigned to protect essential public transport and rural services for our many villages and towns.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dan Roper, Broadland’s Lib Dem champion, with Liberal Democrat Leader Nick Clegg.

endorsements.endorsement: Dan Roper with Vince Cable 'Everyone knows Vince speaks common sense'

quotes.text: If you want Vince Cable in Number 11 Downing Street, then vote for Dan Roper in Broadland and support Nick Clegg’s Liberal Democrats.

images.caption: Dan Roper, Broadland’s Lib Dem champion, with Liberal Democrat Leader Nick Clegg.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leading political website says 'It's a two horse race here'. Figures for Broadland constituency from www.electoralcalculus.co.uk based on latest opinion polls.
